name: Mario Party Grab Bag
description:
This collection includes four minigames: Bumper Balls, Pathfumblers, Domination, and Quick Draw. Adapted from various minigames in the Mario Party series.

The Super Mario series, including many sprites & tile assets used in this collection, is owned by Nintendo. Other sprites by LucasPucas.

Music used:

New Super Mario Bros. Wii 8-Bit Remix by Bulby

Super Mario Bros. 3 OST VRC6 [Famitracker VRC6 Covers] by Skydev

Rude Buster - Deltarune (Kirby's Adventure NES Style) by VinylCheese

Slide Theme [8-bit; VRC6] by MegaBaz
